body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Walter Ramirez and the customer's name is Lauren Foster.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Walter Ramirez, and I work at Phat Hogs, the premier motorcycle dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Walter. I'm Lauren Foster, and I have some questions about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Lauren! I'd be happy to help with any questions you have. What specifically would you like to know?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in the new models you have in stock, particularly the ones designed for beginners.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! We have several models perfect for beginners. Before I dive into that, could I please have your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could I also get your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three four five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks, Lauren! Now, regarding our beginner models, we have the Phat Cruiser and the Mini Hog.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds great! I've heard good things about both.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that! If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I really appreciate your help today, Walter.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Lauren! It was a pleasure speaking with you. Have a great day!
